trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script:
SetVar("KnownMap",0) SetVar("BezhenAlive",0) SetVar("OracleQuickWay",0) if GAME_VERSION then SetVar("ISLVersion", GAME_VERSION) end
if QuestStatus("d_FindOracul_Quest")==Q_TAKEN then GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle( 0 ) TActivate("RolikBegin_ToSailSubmarine")
TakeQuest("r3m1_FindNative_2") AddHistory( "r3_After_WaterGate_1" ) AddHistory( "r3_JustGo_1" ) AddFadingMsgId( "fm_history_got" ) end

trigger.Name: trPlaceSecret
trigger.script:
local i=1 local gunlist = {"hornet01","specter01","pkt01","kord01","storm01","fagot01","maxim01","vector01","vulcan01","kpvt01","rapier01","flag01","rainmetal01","elephant01","odin01","omega01","bumblebee01","hammer01","hunterSideGun","mrakSideGun","big_swingfire01","cyclops01","octopus01","hailSideGun","hurricane01","rocketLauncher","zeusSideGun","marsSideGun"} local len = getn(gunlist)
while getObj("SecretPlace"..i.."_loc")~=nil do CreateBoxWithAffixGun(CVector(getPos("SecretPlace"..i.."_loc")), gunlist[exrandom(len)], random(0, 2)) i = i + 1 end
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: tr_RescueCarsDist
trigger.script:
local run = GetEntityByName("BezhenVeh1") local pl = GetEntityByName("BezhenVeh2") local len
if run and run:IsAlive() then if pl and pl:IsAlive() then len = Dist(pl, run) if (len > 75) then if Dist(run, getObj("Set_enter")) > Dist(pl, getObj("Set_enter")) then pl:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) pl:SetThrottle( 0 ) else run:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) run:SetThrottle( 0 ) end end end end

trigger.Name: trMovePlToR1M4
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.x = PlfCoor.x + 30 PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 5 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z - 15
ValidateGameVersion()
if IsQuestItemPresent( "quest_key_for_submarine" ) or IsQuestItemPresent( "quest_key_for_submarine1" ) then local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" ) if b == 1 then TActivate("RolikBegin_ToComeSubmarine") else SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
FlyAround(0.1, 0, -45, 3, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate ("trMovePlToR1M4_Fade") TActivate ("trMovePlToR1M4_End") end else AddImportantFadingMsgId( "fm_key_lost" ) end

TDeactivate( "trMovePlToR1M4_Fade" )
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trExitFromMap21
trigger.script:

local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.x = PlfCoor.x + 35 PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 10 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 35
if IsQuestTaken("Disk2OrakulLisa") then ValidateGameVersion()
local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" ) if b == 1 then PassToMap("r2m1", "FromR3M1", -1 )
TActivate("trMoveFromR1M4") TActivate("CutsceneDisable")
TDeactivate("UlukBattle2")

FlyAround(0.1, 0, -25, 3, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("trExitFromMap21_End")
trigger:Deactivate() end else SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)

AddCinematicMessage(8803, 0.5)
TActivate("trExitFromMap21_End")
trigger:Deactivate() end

if IsQuestTaken("r3m1_GoToOracle")~=nil then ValidateGameVersion()
local b = SpawnMessageBox( "8801" ) if b == 1 then PassToMap("r3m2", "FromR3M1", -1 ) TDeactivate("UlukBattle2") SetTolerance(1020,1002,RS_ENEMY)
local Fion = getObj("Set_Bar_Customer1") if Fion then Fion:SetSpokenCount( 1 ) end else SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)

local Fion = getObj("Set_Bar_Customer1") if Fion then Fion:SetSpokenCount( 1 ) end

FlyAround(0.5, 0, 25, 7, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(8802, 0.5)
TActivate("trExitFromMap32_End") end end
